00038 #ifndef _SINGLETON_H__
00039 #define _SINGLETON_H__
00040 
00041 // Added by Steve Streeting for Ogre
00042 #include "OgrePrerequisites.h"
00043 
00044 #if OGRE_COMPILER == OGRE_COMPILER_MSVC
00045 // Turn off warnings generated by this singleton implementation
00046 #   pragma warning (disable : 4311)
00047 #   pragma warning (disable : 4312)
00048 #endif
00049 
00050 #if defined ( OGRE_GCC_VISIBILITY )
00051 #   pragma GCC visibility push(default)
00052 #endif
00053 namespace Ogre {
00054 // End SJS additions
00057     template <typename T> class Singleton
00058     {
00059     protected:
00060 
00061         static T* ms_Singleton;
00062 
00063     public:
00064         Singleton( void )
00065         {
00066             assert( !ms_Singleton );
00067 #if defined( _MSC_VER ) && _MSC_VER < 1200   
00068             int offset = (int)(T*)1 - (int)(Singleton <T>*)(T*)1;
00069             ms_Singleton = (T*)((int)this + offset);
00070 #else
00071         ms_Singleton = static_cast< T* >( this );
00072 #endif
00073         }
00074         ~Singleton( void )
00075             {  assert( ms_Singleton );  ms_Singleton = 0;  }
00076         static T& getSingleton( void )
00077         {   assert( ms_Singleton );  return ( *ms_Singleton ); }
00078         static T* getSingletonPtr( void )
00079         { return ms_Singleton; }
00080     };
00081 }
00082 #if defined ( OGRE_GCC_VISIBILITY )
00083 #   pragma GCC visibility pop
00084 #endif
00085 #endif
